newsitem.title: UK: Bank of England to auction one bln Ecu of T-bills.
newsitem.headline: Bank of England to auction one bln Ecu of T-bills.

text.p: The Bank of England said it will auction one billion Ecu of Treasury bills next Tuesday, comprising 200 million Ecu of one-month bills, 500 million Ecu of three-month bills and 300 million Ecu of six-month bills.
The Bank said an additional 50 million Ecu of T-bills would be allotted directly to itself for use in adding liquidity to the market through sale and repurchase agreements.
The bills for auction will be dated April 10, 1997 with the one-month bills maturing May 15, 1997, the three-month bills on July 10, 1997, and the six-month bills on October 16, 1997.
